greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Matrix product of Binomial triangle A007318 and triangle with (1, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5,...) in the main diagonal and the rest zeros.
formula: T(0,0) = 1; T(n,k) = k* C(n,k) for n>=1, where C(n,k) is the binomial coefficient.
example: First few rows of the triangle are:
